name: Rescue Dog Bubble
description:
Rescue Dog Bubble is an amazing, new, addictive bubble shooter game you would have ever played. Rescue pet and collect bones are the challenges of this easy to play game with unlimited fun!!!
Features
• Bubble Shooting game with rescue baby pet theme
• 100s of exciting levels with different tasks to complete
• Explore the beautiful world with cute puppies
• Collect bones and rescue trapped puppy
• Easy to play and fun to master bubble shooting game
• You can play this anytime offline
• Soothing sound and great visual effects
